content: Each Chapter of Black Myth Wukong also contains one or more secret Yaoguai King Boss Fights - some of which are tied to a "Secret" sub-region that will take you to a new area, and others you must solve puzzles to uncover a secret boss room and fight.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Boss_List_and_Guides.md', within the main section titled 'Boss List and Guides', specifically from the subsection 'Boss Types'.
The content is as follows:
Each Chapter of Black Myth Wukong also contains one or more secret Yaoguai King Boss Fights - some of which are tied to a "Secret" sub-region that will take you to a new area, and others you must solve puzzles to uncover a secret boss room and fight.
